sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' export class Newsitem extends Component { render() { let {title, description, imgUrl, newsUrl, author,source} = this.props return (
{source}
{title}

{description}

By {!author?'Unknown':author} on {/*new Date(date).toGMTString*/}

Read more...
) } } export default Newsitem
